website_summaries.verdict: Get your motor running with authentic-looking motorbike boots.
pros: A feminine version of a biker boot, which also comes in tan suede or textured white leather
Cute and comfortable, with a padded footbed
cons: Not thick enough for actual motorcycle riding
They make a clompy noise on hard surfaces

customer_reviews.title: fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Within 1 week of wearing these boots, both of the bottom of the heels fell off.... returning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very stylish but run a bit snug. I wouldn’t say they are too tight but I will need to break them in to be 100% comfortable. I have a narrow foot and wear a 6.5, I ordered the 6.5. Length of the shoe is perfect just a little tight in the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drake Concert Worthy!
customer_reviews.text: I love These boots. I’ve been meaning to get a pair of motorcycle boots and I’m glad I chose this pair. I wore Them to the Drake Concert here in Inglewood. They arrived just in time to complete my “look”. I wear Size 9, I ordered size 9 and they fit perfectly. Comfy... I danced all Night!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darrylon Evans

customer_reviews.title: Lovely boots !
customer_reviews.text: These Boots Are everything extremely comfortable my is a size 9 and 1/2 to 10, I tend to always go with a 10 unless it's a sandal or a slingback shoe because the winters up North can be brutal so I like to put on that thick pair of socks. I have long thin feet, if you have a wide foot or a high instep it may be a little tight for you on the top of your foot. I receive compliments from men and women when I wear these boots very comfortable and a great leather.
customer_reviews.author: Ella4

customer_reviews.title: Can be bought other places MUCH cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for 169.00. The boos are fantastic. Fit is a little big bit the quality and look is great. That are a very feminine approach to a biker boot. They problem is, you can get these boot for 69.00 almost anywhere else. I paid 100.00 more than I needed to. Very disappointed. They have them in other colors and I will purchase them at 100.00 dollars LESS.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Mac

customer_reviews.title: One happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these boots last year but they sold out then I did a search this year and they were back. I got them for $70.00 and I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: These are great, comfortable boots for the fall
customer_reviews.text: These are great, comfortable boots for the fall! While I wish they were more of a true leather so I wouldn’t worry about wearing them in the rain, they’re a really nice texture and look great with leggings or tight pants. My only warning is they’re kind of loud when you walk but would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: I love my boots
customer_reviews.text: Update.... I had to give back my 5 🌟. The heel came off and I have worn these maybe 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: DaTexasQt

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and Workmanship - Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: The first day I wore them, the heel came unglued from the body of the boot. I was at work which made it very embarrassing. I returned them for a full refund. These boots were poorly made, and not the same quality of another pair of similar Vice Camuto Moto boots I bought 2 years ago on QVC. These seemed like "knock-offs". The leather was very stiff, and almost seemed artificial (as in Pu-leather)? Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate Creek

customer_reviews.title: These boots are Great!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the look of these boots are exceptional! I love the look I would have given these boots 5 stars but the toe of the boot is kinda hard I don't know if it's because they are Motorcycle boots or not and they run between too small and fit as expected so I suggest buying 1/2 size larger otherwise I would tell everyone YES! buy these boots
customer_reviews.author: Shopper's Dream

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking boots
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots! But I returned them and bought the version only available on Vince Camuto’s Site. They’re a little morre fashionable for these but had I not saw those o would have kept these for sure.
customer_reviews.author: chrissyo

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching! If you don’t like attention you’d better not buy!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are stunning! True to size, leather, and shiny gold metal. I’ve worn them all day long without any rubbing or discomfort. I’ve received loads of compliments, even from men! Lol!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boot but not for me
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely a beautiful pair of boots. I wanted to love them! Alas, they were an odd fit for me. They were too narrow in the footbed and too wide in the heel...
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: Stunning boot!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful, and I give them 5 stars for comfort as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I love them and they are comfy and gorgeous boots
customer_reviews.text: Very nice in person and I love these. I can’t wait to rock them this riding season/
customer_reviews.author: Monica Summers

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching
customer_reviews.text: Fit is as sized, great look, I love Vince Camuto. I own several pair
customer_reviews.author: D. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Stylish real leather
customer_reviews.text: Leather a little funky, not smooth, soft cowhide, but seems durable. Love the style!
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Run small, fab boots
customer_reviews.text: I had to send these back, but they are fabulous. Just buy half size up, they run small. I wear 8 with reg. Socks, nothing super thick, but not thin dress socks. Ended up ordering 8.5 from Nordstom Rack for $79
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Perry

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous boots and super comfortable. They fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous boots and super comfortable. They fit true to size, no need to size up or down! They don't rub or squeeze my feet at all. Very high quality boots, and so glad I got them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Biker boot meets fashion
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter; she absolutely loves them. I borrowed and they are crazy cute! I’m getting a pair for myself
customer_reviews.author: Maria-

customer_reviews.title: Sexy Tough badass Boots !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these boots !!!! They are not comfortable and scream sexy with comfort and bad ass attitude...
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit perfect and they are just beautiful. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Nier

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Boots are not lined and every time I have pants that are not black the black goes onto the pants and it cannot be washed out.Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Bad Construction
customer_reviews.text: Great boot BUT both heels disintegrated and I’ve only work them a handful of times. These particular boots are defective.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots comfortable but I wish the buckle's were silver as first advertised.Had in my cart for awhile though so when I eventually ordered got gold.But I am really happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Cute cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much! Stylish and comfortable! I have a wider foot so they hurt a little in the beginning, but once I broke them in it was all good!
customer_reviews.author: Anaese V.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots but they came in brown not black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of the boot, fits great. I've had them for 3 weeks and the heel is falling apart. Didn't expect it to fall apart so quickly. Very disappointed because I'm a big fan of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Torres

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 7. I read all the comments- if you want to wear socks go up half a size. I don’t wear socks so 7 works for me. They are comfortable and of course trendy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Returned but I loved them.
customer_reviews.text: Returned them only because my legs are small and the calf size of this boot was much larger. Otherwise I wanted to keep them. They were nice! Classy!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I was super skeptical buying shoes off amazon but these are perfect- ...
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical buying shoes off amazon but these are perfect- not knock offs and had zero damage. I’m incredibly happy and will continue to buy from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Fits just right and is a pretty sexy boot !Iove them & definitely recommend them thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Addison

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boot - Too Big/Too Small!?
customer_reviews.text: Typically, I wear 9.5 however it “just” fit. The 10 was too big. I returned Both. It is a very nice boot, sturdy yet stylish. Had they fit I definitely would have kept them.
customer_reviews.author: L. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: My Wife Loved Them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife for her birthday. She loved the style and comfort of the boot. Fit was as expected, just right and great quality leather!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Tytka

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: First time I wore them the silver piece on the heel lifted from the boot was pissed
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Royster

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boots!
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on these every time I wear them. They are the perfect boot. They go with so many things and are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Liane Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: Boots were Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Vince Camuto Moto boots size 7 was too small and narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my normal 7 1/2 and it was a bit tight. I did get them stretched out after 5-6 times wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous but too big Size down not up as specified! And now they are no longer on sale.👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love them and get compliments on them everytime i wear them
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTAL WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice boot, high quality and well made, love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jenneel

customer_reviews.title: Gold part broke
customer_reviews.text: The boots fit great, but the gold part around the back of the boot broke off within a month of me wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: fits well
customer_reviews.text: I just love the workmanship on this boot. The style is for any age whoever whatever floats your boat. Love mid calf very comfy. This is my second pair first pair is brown just had to get black to.
customer_reviews.author: Rot-zee

product_meta.title: Vince Camuto Women's Windy Motorcycle Boot
product_meta.description:
Moto boot

Vince Camuto is a true footwear innovator, both of design and of industry. The designer and creator of the Camuto group, Vince Camuto produces many brands and styles, and Vince Camuto women's shoes are among the most beautiful and finely crafted footwear available.
